name: Madotsuki's Story: Retrograde (DEMO)
description:
Madotsuki has another weird dreamin this platformer fangame demo of Yume Nikki.

--

Controls

  • Left and right arrow keys: move
  • (Left) Shift: jump
  • Tab: (De)activate Knife Effect
  • (Left) Ctrl: Stab (must have Knife Effect on)
  • Enter: Pause (inside a World only)
  • Esc: Quit to title (Nexus only)

--

If you have any question or comments, you can comment below, or contact me via e-mail or Twitter. You can find that info on my itch.io profile or in the readme file included in the game.
